channel.title: Changing Cousor

item.title: Changing Cousor
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

Haha I made my own little thing seince doc booty did. FEEDBACK

program Changing_Cursor;
var x, y, Icon : integer;
    buffer : integer;


procedure CursorToMouse;
Var
   W, H, x1, y1 : integer;
begin

   DisplayDebugImgWindow(500, 400);
   Buffer:= BitmapFromString(500, 400, '');

        SetTransparentColor(Icon ,  clblack);
        If(FindWindowTitlePart('Debug', False))Then
          Begin
                GetClientDimensions(W, H);
                writeln('Successfully complied')
                end;

              repeat

              getmousepos(x,y)
              X1:= X - 10;
              y1:= y - 10;

              FastDrawSizeTransparent(x1, y1, x1+22, y1+22, Icon, Buffer)

         SafeDrawBitmap(Buffer, GetDebugCanvas, 0, 0);
         FastDrawClear(Buffer, clblack);
         until(false)
end;


procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
  Icon := BitmapFromString(89, 89, 'z78DAEDDCCB11C3200C05C096' +
       '5C85FB2F29D71C3D968491D877CF67602340B17DDF2222D15C7F3' +
       '11A7225C54852911BB340051B54503149C57A51E662868A2E9F28' +
       'B92B0815545021EB67CABE820A2AA8B07650E14C4A85FE1515BA9' +
       'AF2950A633E5B85D1A3820A2A741BA888A860E3E47E051B5444F6' +
       '2146F53415D53618EBABA2C286FA43C5BBD3B1F9DA5F45D66F9C8' +
       'AFD6DEC5973D8B01255DB606CFF9AB35285FA33A3CEE4DAA0820A' +
       '2A66EF49A8A0820A79B2465041051512D973524145BC8F41C5992' +
       'ADE5D1F12F9B6E66ECF9348FC8A326B1015544C3A89C45F656732' +
       '4945D695E7FBEC4CA4A26254D4162ABAD78DBAEB90AB7726D25D4' +
       '5DD3F32526DA3DA1B15DD77A115BD322ABA08A9E88A50C11515B2' +
       '46052D54B887E5E433EF9A53B35021DD6D64A960E33415CFDFDFF' +
       '8CFEB8AF8C744BE55C11215EACC6C15754F7A31FE93FA60545041' +
       '051515CF55A06276AFC39D8F54AC57C1CFFE9DAEEAE77755EC616' +
       '47645A2820D2AD8A042A8102A245788F3A9C4FB1B428591A1820A' +
       'A142A8102A840A73B732C69C072AA8A0820D1E44444444A44B7E2' +
       'AF98011');
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
CursorToMouse
end.
